page.title: 18Land Use In Our Survey Area
page.content: {Mr Hooper}a land owner in {COLD NORTON and also one of our school Governors, told us that most of the farmland in { and around COLD NORTON is used for growing cereals including oil seed rape and lucerne . Lucerne is mostly sent to Asheldham and turned into cubes which are used to feed all sorts of animals mainly cows and pigs.The other crops we have around {COLD {NORTON}are barley,wheat, oats,and peas.Very few people in {COLD {NORTON}own farm animals as far as we know although Mr Hooper has a beef cattle herd and Great Hayes is the only one with a dairy herd of two hundred.
